articles.content:
2003: BANNED FROM DRIVING AFTER DRINK-DRIVING
Ryan was banned from driving and was fined £2,250 as a consequence of drink-driving in 2003. 
JUNE 2008: FOUND GUILTY OF ASSAULTING A TAXI DRIVER 
On … [+6732 chars]
